definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Yes, dear fox, why don't you go?
sentences.chinese: 是呀，可愛的白狐，你憑什麼不走？

sentences.english: Poor white fox, why don't you go?
sentences.chinese: 可憐的白狐，你憑什麼不走？

sentences.english: Lovely white fox, so you let me love is love.
sentences.chinese: 可愛的白狐，這樣的你讓我喜歡有心疼。

sentences.english: As the arctic fox true love, it is destined to be unique.
sentences.chinese: 彷彿白狐純愛，註定獨一無二。

definition: silver or black fox (Vulpes alopex argentatus)
fox lady/in folk stories, a beautiful girl who will seduce you then reveal herself as a ghost
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
